title: CROPPED PAISLEY JACQUARD JACKET
desc: Cropped jacket in cotton-blend jacquard fabric with tonal Paisley motif. This item features two pockets with flap and Pegaso buttons,, Pegaso button fastening, and trim-adorned edges.• Fitted• Pointed collar• Fastened with Pegaso buttons• Front pockets with flap• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
